Options.label: E
Options.text: SELECT NVL2(cust_credit_limit, TO_CHAR(cust_credit_limit * .15), 'Not Available') FROM customers;

questions.Explanation: 1.NVL(expr1, expr2)必须两个参数。返回值的数据类型与第一个参数(expr1) 保持一致。数据库会尝试把 expr2 转换成 expr1 的类型(如果类型不同),如果不能转换则报错。2.NVL2(expr1,expr2, expr3) 含义是:如果第一个参数为空,则返回第三个参数;如果第一个参数不为空那么显示第二个参数的值。expr2 与 expr3 的数据类型应该互相兼容（通常都为字符串或都为数字等）。

questions.QuestionText: Which SQL statement would produce the required result?

Options.label: A
Options.text: SELECT NVL (TO_CHAR(cust_credit_limit*.15), ‘Not Available’) “NEW CREDIT” FROM customers

Options.label: B
Options.text: SELECT TO_CHAR(NVL(cust_credit_limit*.15), ‘Not Available’)) “NEW CREDIT” FROM customers

Options.label: C
Options.text: SELECT NVL (cust_credit_limit*.15, ‘Not Available’) “NEW CREDIT” FROM customers

Options.label: D
Options.text: SELECT NVL (cust_credit_limit, ‘Not Available’)*.15 “NEW CREDIT” FROM customers

questions.Explanation: NVL(expr1, expr2)必须两个参数。返回值的数据类型与第一个参数(expr1) 保持一致。数据库会尝试把 expr2 转换成 expr1 的类型(如果类型不同),如果不能转换则报错。

questions.QuestionText: Which statement is true about aggregate functions?

Options.label: A
Options.text: Aggregate functions can be nested to any number of levels

Options.label: B
Options.text: The AVG function implicitly converts NULLS to zero

Options.label: C
Options.text: Aggregate functions can be used in any clause of a SELECT statement

Options.label: D
Options.text: Types MAX and MIN functions can be used on columns with character data

questions.Explanation: A.聚合函数不可以无限嵌套，单行函数可以嵌套无穷 B.AVG 计算平均值时，NULL 值会被忽略，并不是当作 0 参与计算。C.聚合函数不能在任意子句中使用，例如 WHERE 子句 中是不允许的（因为 WHERE 是在聚合前过滤数据），只能在 SELECT 列表、HAVING 子句 或 ORDER BY 中使用。D.max 和 min 可以用在数字、字符、和日期型的数据类型上

questions.QuestionText: Which two statements are true regarding the WHERE and HAVING clauses in a SELECT statement? (Choose two.)

Options.label: A
Options.text: The WHERE and HAVING clauses can be used in the same statement only if they are applied to different columns in the table.

Options.label: B
Options.text: The aggregate functions and columns used in the HAVING clause must be specified in the SELECT list of the query.

Options.label: C
Options.text: The WHERE clause can be used to exclude rows after dividing them into groups.

Options.label: D
Options.text: The HAVING clause can be used with aggregate functions in subqueries.

Options.label: E
Options.text: The WHERE clause can be used to exclude rows before dividing them into groups.

questions.Explanation: A.where 和 having 子句中用到的列没有相关联性 B.HAVING 可以使用未在 SELECT 中显示的聚合函数 C.WHERE 是在分组 前 执行的，不能用于分组后的数据。分组后筛选必须用 HAVING

questions.QuestionText: Your database instance was shut down normally and then started in NOMOUNT state. You then execute this command: ALTER DATABASE MOUNT; Which two actions are performed? (Choose two.)

Options.label: A
Options.text: The online redo logs are opened

Options.label: B
Options.text: The online data files are opened

Options.label: C
Options.text: The alert log records the execution details

Options.label: D
Options.text: The Oracle background processes are started

Options.label: E
Options.text: The initialization parameter file is read

Options.label: F
Options.text: The control file is read

questions.Explanation: 1.NOMOUNT:实例启动，但数据库还没有挂载。读取 初始化参数文件(SPFILE 或 PFILE)。启动Oracle后台进程(如 SMON、PMON、DBWR 等)。不读控制文件。不打开数据文件和重做日志。2.MOUNT:使用 ALTER DATABASE MOUNT 或 STARTUP MOUNT。读取 控制文件。可以进行数据库恢复和修改操作(例如修改表空间)。不打开数据文件。不打开在线重做日志(redo log)。3.OPEN:使用 ALTER DATABASE OPEN。数据库可以正常访问。打开数据文件和 redo log。

questions.QuestionText: Which two are true about shrinking a segment online? (Choose two.)

Options.label: A
Options.text: It is not possible to shrink either indexes or Index Organized Tables (IOTs)

Options.label: B
Options.text: It always eliminates all migrated rows if any exist in the table

Options.label: C
Options.text: To shrink a table it must have a PRIMARY KEY constraint

Options.label: D
Options.text: To shrink a table it must have a UNIQUE KEY constraint

Options.label: E
Options.text: To shrink a table it must have row movement enabled

Options.label: F
Options.text: It must be in a tablespace that uses Automatic Segment Space Management (ASSM)

questions.Explanation: 在 Oracle 中，ALTER TABLE ... SHRINK SPACE 可以用来释放表或索引占用的空间，同时整理表中的行，使它们尽量紧凑地存储。它可以 在线（online） 执行，也就是在收缩表的同时，应用仍然可以对表进行 DML 操作（INSERT、UPDATE、DELETE）Online shrink 只能在使用 ASSM 的表空间中执行，因为 ASSM 才能管理空闲空间并允许在线段收缩。必须启用行移动（row movement）。A.在线收缩 不能直接收缩 IOT（Index Organized Table），但普通表的索引是可以收缩的（ALTER INDEX ... SHRINK SPACE）。

questions.QuestionText: What must you do before executing it?

Options.label: A
Options.text: Ensure there are no pending transactions on the table.

Options.label: B
Options.text: Disable all indexes on the table.

Options.label: C
Options.text: Ensure free space that is approximately equal to the space used by the table should be available.

Options.label: D
Options.text: Enable row movement is enabled.

questions.Explanation: SHRINK SPACE 是 Oracle 用来回收表的空闲空间 的命令。COMPACT 表示 仅整理行，使行紧凑，不立即收回空间。COMPACT 只是重排行，把空闲空间集中到段的末尾，但不会立即减少段大小。如果想最终释放空间，需要执行 SHRINK SPACE（不带 COMPACT）或再执行 SHRINK SPACE 不带 COMPACT。

questions.QuestionText:
You want to reduce fragmentation and reclaim unused space for the sales table but not its dependent objects. During this operation, you want to ensure the following:
i. Long-running queries are not affected.
ii. No extra space is used.
iii. Data manipulation language (DML) operations on the table succeed at all times throughout the process
iv. Unused space is reclaimed both above and below the high water mark.
Which ALTER TABLE option would you recommend?

Options.label: A
Options.text: DEALLOCATE UNUSED

Options.label: B
Options.text: SHRINK SPACE CASCADE

Options.label: C
Options.text: SHRINK SPACE COMPACT

Options.label: D
Options.text: ROW STORE COMPRESS BASIC

questions.Explanation: (high water mark)HWM = 表空间使用的“最高标记”，不是实际数据量，而是已分配过的最高位置.A.只会释放表尾的未使用块。不能释放 HWM 以下的空间，也不能处理表中间的碎片 B.可以收回表和依赖的对象（索引）的空间。但题目要求不要影响 dependent objects，而 CASCADE 会同时移动索引等依赖对象。D.这是表压缩选项，主要用来减少存储占用，提高查询性能,不是专门用来回收碎片，也可能需要额外空间,SHRINK SPACE → 回收碎片、释放空间ROW STORE COMPRESS BASIC → 压缩数据，提高存储利用率

questions.QuestionText: Which four actions are possible during an Online Datafile Move operation?

Options.label: A
Options.text: Creating and dropping tables in the datafile being moved

Options.label: B
Options.text: Performing file shrink of the data file being moved

Options.label: C
Options.text: Querying tables in the datafile being moved

Options.label: D
Options.text: Performing Block Media Recovery for a data block in the datafile being moved

Options.label: E
Options.text: Flashing back the database

Options.label: F
Options.text: Executing DML statements on objects stored in the datafile being moved

questions.Explanation: Online Datafile Move可以在表空间在线（不需要关闭数据库）的情况下，把数据文件从一个位置移动到另一个位置或不同的磁盘卷上。表和索引在移动期间仍然可以访问。移动过程尽量不阻塞用户操作。移动是在线进行的，但有些操作是受限的。A.在线数据文件移动不会阻止对该文件中表的 DDL（创建、删除表等）操作 B.File shrink是收缩文件空间的操作，需要对文件本身做结构性调整。在线移动期间，数据文件正在被 Oracle 系统操作，无法同时执行收缩操作。D.Block Media Recovery (BMR) 是针对单个数据块的恢复操作。在线数据文件移动不影响 BMR，可以在需要的时候修复特定数据块。

questions.QuestionText: Which two statements are true about the SQL*Loader (sqlldr) execution? (Choose two.)

Options.label: A
Options.text: It overwrites data in EMP with data in EMP.DAT

Options.label: B
Options.text: It uses the database buffer cache to load data

Options.label: C
Options.text: It generates a log that contains control file entries, which can be used with normal SQL*Loader operations

Options.label: D
Options.text: It generates a SQL script that it uses to load data from EMP.DAT to EMP

Options.label: E
Options.text: It appends data from EMP.DAT to EMP

questions.Explanation: SQL*Loader(sqlldr) 可以有三种模式来加载数据：1.INSERT插入数据到表中。表必须为空，如果表已经存在数据，会报错。2.APPEND（默认模式）在现有数据基础上追加数据。3.REPLACE删除表中原有数据，然后加载新数据。如果没有在命令中指定，默认模式是APPEND。B.SQL*Loader 默认使用 直接路径（direct path）或常规路径（conventional path）。直接路径加载会绕过数据库缓冲区。常规路径加载会使用 SQL 插入操作，但不等同于直接操作缓存。

questions.QuestionText:
A script abc.sql must be executed to perform a job. A database user HR, who is defined in this database, executes this command:
$ sqlplus hr/hr@orcl @abc.sql
What will happen upon execution?

Options.label: A
Options.text: The command succeeds and HR will be connected to the orcl and abc.sql databases

Options.label: B
Options.text: The command succeeds and HR will be connected to the orcl database instance, and the abc.sql script will be executed

Options.label: C
Options.text: The command fails because the script must refer to the full path name

Options.label: D
Options.text: The command fails and reports an error because @ is used twice

questions.Explanation: 命令行提示符 $（普通用户）或 #（root 用户）来表示可以输入命令。sqlplus 是启动 Oracle SQL*Plus 客户端的命令。hr/hr@orcl表示:用户名hr,密码hr,数据库实例orcl（TNS alias，表示要连接的数据库）,所以执行这个命令后，SQL*Plus会尝试连接到orcl数据库，使用 HR 用户。@abc.sql在 SQL*Plus 中，@filename 用于执行SQL脚本文件,这里的 abc.sql 可以是：当前目录下的文件或者指定完整路径（如 /home/oracle/abc.sql）。SQL*Plus会读取这个文件，并执行里面的SQL命令。

questions.QuestionText: Which three statements are true regarding indexes? (Choose three.)

Options.label: A
Options.text: A UNIQUE index can be altered to be non-unique

Options.label: B
Options.text: A SELECT statement can access one or more indexes without accessing any tables

Options.label: C
Options.text: A table belonging to one user can have an index that belongs to a different user

Options.label: D
Options.text: An update to a table can result in updates to any or all of the table’s indexes

Options.label: E
Options.text: When a table is dropped and is moved to the RECYCLE BIN, all indexes built on that table are permanently dropped

Options.label: F
Options.text: An update to a table can result in no updates to any of the table’s indexes

questions.Explanation: 索引在数据库中主要作用是提高查询效率，并在某些情况下维护数据完整性（如 UNIQUE 或 PRIMARY KEY）。A.UNIQUE 索引本身不能直接改成非唯一索引。你需要先删除索引，然后重新创建为非唯一索引。B.如果查询中需要的列 不在索引里，数据库仍然需要回表。并不是所有索引都是覆盖索引，只有当索引包含查询所需的所有列时才是。E.当表被放入 RECYCLE BIN 时，表和它的索引都暂时保留在回收站中，可以用 FLASHBACK TABLE 恢复。DF.对表的更新可能导致对表的任何或所有索引的更新,例如:更新表的列是索引的列,也可能不会导致对表索引的任何更新,例如:更新表的列不是索引的列

questions.QuestionText: Which three statements are true about Oracle synonyms? (Choose three.)

Options.label: A
Options.text: A synonym cannot be created for a PL/SQL package

Options.label: B
Options.text: A synonym can be available to all users

Options.label: C
Options.text: A SEQUENCE can have a synonym

Options.label: D
Options.text: A synonym created by one user can refer to an object belonging to another user

Options.label: E
Options.text: Any user can drop a PUBLIC synonym

questions.Explanation: Synonym相当于是一个别名，用来引用数据库中的其他对象（表、视图、序列、存储过程、函数、包等）。简化了对象访问（不用写完整的schema.object）。屏蔽对象实际所属 schema 或位置。Private synonym（私有同义词）：只能由创建它的用户访问。Public synonym（公共同义词）：所有用户都可以访问。只有属主和有drop public synonym权限的用户才能够删除public同义词。C.SEQUENCE（序列）是一个独立的数据库对象，用来生成唯一的、按顺序递增或递减的数字

questions.QuestionText: Which two tasks can be performed on an external table?

Options.label: A
Options.text: Partitioning the table

Options.label: B
Options.text: Creating an invisible index

Options.label: C
Options.text: Updating the table by using an UPDATE statement

Options.label: D
Options.text: Creating a public synonym

Options.label: E
Options.text: Creating a view

questions.Explanation: 外部表（External Table）是 Oracle 提供的一种功能，让你可以 像查询普通表一样访问数据库外部的文件（比如 CSV、文本文件等）。数据存储在数据库外部，Oracle 只是“读取”它。可以用 SELECT 查询数据。不能进行 DML 操作（INSERT、UPDATE、DELETE），因为数据不在数据库里。E.视图 = 一张“查询结果表”，用来看数据，但不存数据本身

questions.QuestionText: Which is true?

Options.label: A
Options.text: It performs the export successfully.

Options.label: B
Options.text: It throws an error as the table test_employees is empty and CONTENT=data_only is specified.

Options.label: C
Options.text: It throws an error as the QUERY parameter is not supported on an empty table.

Options.label: D
Options.text: It throws an error as Data Pump cannot find a table called TEST.EMP.

questions.Explanation: Oracle Data Pump 是 Oracle 提供的一种高速数据导入/导出工具，用来在数据库之间迁移数据或备份表、模式、表空间等。它的命令行工具有两个：expdp → Export Data Pump：导出数据（生成 .dmp 文件）。impdp → Import Data Pump：导入数据（从 .dmp 文件恢复数据）。比传统 exp/imp 快，支持并行导出/导入，支持导出表、视图、模式、表空间。支持通过 查询过滤导出部分数据。可以导出到服务器上指定的目录，而不是客户端。本题:创建了DIRECTORY dumpdir一个物理目录，给了所有用户读写public权限，创建了一个新用户TEST密码是test，TEST创建了一个test_employees表格，为 test_employees 表创建了一个 同义词 emp。最后指令TABLES=emp 指定了要导出的对象是emp。但emp是同义词，不是表，Data Pump 不直接支持导出同义词，它只能导出 表、视图、模式等真实对象。即使emp指向test_employees，Data Pump仍然会报错：“找不到表 TEST.EMP”。

Options.label: A
Options.text: All data along with the table structure is deleted.

Options.label: B
Options.text: A pending transaction in the session is committed.

Options.label: C
Options.text: All indexes on the table remain but they are invalidated.

Options.label: D
Options.text: All views and synonyms on the table remain but they are invalidated.

Options.label: E
Options.text: All data in the table is deleted but the table structure remains.

questions.Explanation: B.Oracle 中 DDL 自动提交，Oracle在执行DROP TABLE前，会隐式提交当前会话里的所有未提交事务。

questions.QuestionText: Which two tasks require subqueries? (Choose two.)

Options.label: A
Options.text: Display the number of products whose PROD_LIST_PRICE is more than the average PROD_LIST_PRICE

Options.label: B
Options.text: Display suppliers whose PROD_LIST_PRICE is less than 1000

Options.label: C
Options.text: Display products whose PROD_MIN_PRICE is more than the average PROD_LIST_PRICE of all products, and whose status is orderable

Options.label: D
Options.text: Display the total number of products supplied by supplier 102 which have a product status of obsolete

Options.label: E
Options.text: Display the minimum PROD_LIST_PRICE for each product status

questions.QuestionText: Which three statements must be true so that the SALES user can create tables in SALES_Q1? (Choose three.)

Options.label: A
Options.text: The sales user must have a quota on the TEMP tablespace

Options.label: B
Options.text: The sales user must have a quota on the SALES_Q1 tablespace to hold the initial extends of all tables they plan to create in their schema

Options.label: C
Options.text: The sales user must have been granted the CREATE SESSION privilege

Options.label: D
Options.text: The sales user must have their quota on the users tablespace removed

Options.label: E
Options.text: The sales user must have a quota on the SALES_Q1 tablespace to hold all the rows to be inserted into any table in their schema

Options.label: F
Options.text: The sales user must have been granted the CREATE TABLE privilege

questions.Explanation: 命令解析:先创建了个用户和密码，但是没给权限。用户创建后，如果没有其他权限，他还不能登录数据库，因为缺少登录权限（CREATE SESSION）。DEFAULT TABLESPACE sales_q1指定该用户的默认表空间为 sales_q1。这意味着：当该用户创建表或索引时，如果不指定 TABLESPACE 子句，这些对象会默认保存在 sales_q1 表空间中。但是要在这个表空间中存储数据，还必须有配额 (quota)。TEMPORARY TABLESPACE temp指定该用户使用的临时表空间。临时表空间用于排序、哈希连接、创建索引等操作的临时数据。普通用户不需要配额使用临时表空间（临时空间不算 quota 限制）。QUOTA 5M ON users;给sales用户在users表空间上分配5MB的使用额度。A.临时表空间不需要配额。它只是用来放排序或中间结果，Oracle自动管理。

questions.QuestionText: Which three statements are true about table data storage in an Oracle Database? (Choose three.)

Options.label: A
Options.text: Data block headers contain their own Data Block Address (DBA)

Options.label: B
Options.text: A table row piece can be chained across several database blocks

Options.label: C
Options.text: Multiple row pieces from the same row may be stored in different database blocks

Options.label: D
Options.text: Multiple row pieces from the same row may be stored in the same block

Options.label: E
Options.text: Data block free space is always contiguous in the middle of the block

Options.label: F
Options.text: Index block free space is always contiguous in the middle of the block

questions.Explanation: A.每个数据块（Data Block）是最小的存储单位。每个数据块由三个主要部分组成：1.Block Header（块头）2.Table Directory / Row Directory（表和行目录）3.Free space + Row data（空闲区和行数据）块头 (Header) 存放元信息，例如：该块的类型（数据块、索引块等）,块所属的段（segment）信息,事务信息（事务槽）,DBA（Data Block Address） — 数据块的物理地址（数据文件号 + 块号）B.一个“行（row）”的数据可能太大，无法完全放进一个数据块,Oracle会将该行拆成多个row piece（行片段）。如果这些行片段分布在不同的数据块中，就叫做 chained row（行链式存储）。

questions.QuestionText: Which two statements are true? (Choose two.)

Options.label: A
Options.text: The second ROLLBACK command does nothing

Options.label: B
Options.text: The second ROLLBACK command replays the delete

Options.label: C
Options.text: The first ROLLBACK command restores the 101 rows that were deleted, leaving the inserted row still to be committed

Options.label: D
Options.text: The second ROLLBACK command undoes the insert

Options.label: E
Options.text: The first ROLLBACK command restores the 101 rows that were deleted and commits the inserted row

questions.Explanation: 1.初始状态(已提交)100行 → 2.INSERT 101行(未提交) → 3.SAVEPOINT a 101行 → 4.DELETE 0行 → 5.ROLLBACK TO a 101行 → 6.ROLLBACK 100行,最后一个rollback指整个事务回滚

questions.QuestionText: Which three statements are true about external tables in Oracle 18c and later releases? (Choose three.)

Options.label: A
Options.text: External table files can be used for other external tables in a different database

Options.label: B
Options.text: The ORACLE_LOADER access driver can be used to unload data from a database into an external table

Options.label: C
Options.text: The ORACLE_DATAPUMP access driver can be used to unload data from a database into an external table

Options.label: D
Options.text: They cannot be partitioned

Options.label: E
Options.text: The ORACLE_DATAPUMP access driver can be used to load data into a database from an external table

Options.label: F
Options.text: They support UPDATEs but not INSERTs and DELETEs

questions.Explanation:
A.外部表只在定义时绑定数据库，实际数据文件可以跨数据库共享。
B.ORACLE_LOADER 是用于读取文本/CSV 文件作为外部表的驱动，不支持“从数据库导出到外部表”.它只支持 读取（LOAD）文件到查询，而不用于写出（UNLOAD）数据.
C.ORACLE_DATAPUMP支持 Data Pump 文件的读写。它可以将数据库表数据导出到 Data Pump 文件，从而实现外部表“卸出（unload）数据”.E一样，也可以load
D.从 12c 开始，外部表是支持分区（partitioned external table）。
F.外部表本质上是只读的（除非使用特殊的可写外部表），默认 不支持 UPDATE、INSERT、DELETE

questions.QuestionText: Which three statements are true about the Oracle join and ANSI join syntax? (Choose three.)

Options.label: A
Options.text: The Oracle join syntax supports creation of a Cartesian product of two tables

Options.label: B
Options.text: The Oracle join syntax performs better than the SQL:1999 compliant ANSI join syntax

Options.label: C
Options.text: The SQL:1999 compliant ANSI join syntax supports natural joins

Options.label: D
Options.text: The SQL:1999 compliant ANSI join syntax supports creation of a Cartesian product of two tables

Options.label: E
Options.text: The Oracle join syntax only supports right outer joins

Options.label: F
Options.text: The Oracle join syntax supports natural joins

Options.label: G
Options.text: The Oracle join syntax performs less well than the SQL:1999 compliant ANSI join syntax

questions.Explanation:
Oracle join syntax(旧式):
-1.使用 (+) 表示外连接
-2.可以产生 Cartesian product
-3.不支持 NATURAL JOIN
-4.LEFT/RIGHT OUTER JOIN都支持
ANSI join syntax(SQL-1999):
-1.使用 INNER/LEFT/RIGHT/FULL JOIN ... ON ...
-2.支持 NATURAL JOIN 和 CROSS JOIN
-3.可读性更高,标准 SQL
-4.性能与 Oracle join 语法相同,由优化器决定
笛卡尔积:
-1.没有连接条件时,表 A 的每行与表 B 的每行组合
-2.行数 = 表 A 行数 × 表 B 行数
A.如果使用 Oracle 的旧式连接语法（没有 WHERE 条件或 ON 条件），两张表会生成笛卡尔积（Cartesian product）。
B.现代 Oracle 优化器对 ANSI join 和 Oracle join 的性能几乎一样。性能取决于执行计划，而不是语法本身
E.Oracle join 语法支持 LEFT OUTER JOIN 和 RIGHT OUTER JOIN，并不仅限于右外连接
F.NATURAL JOIN 属于ANSI标准语法，而非Oracle传统语法

questions.QuestionText: Which two tasks can you perform using DBCA for databases? (Choose two.)

Options.label: A
Options.text: Configure a nonstandard block size for a new database

Options.label: B
Options.text: Register a new database with an available Enterprise Manager Management server

Options.label: C
Options.text: Change the standard block size of an existing database

Options.label: D
Options.text: Configure incremental backups for a new database

Options.label: E
Options.text: Enable flashback database for an existing database

questions.Explanation:
DBCA（Database Configuration Assistant） 是 Oracle 提供的图形化或命令行工具，用于创建、配置和删除数据库，以及注册数据库到 Oracle Enterprise Manager（OEM）。
A.DBCA 可以在创建新数据库时配置非标准数据块大小（nonstandard block size），比如 8KB、16KB、32KB 等，满足特定应用需求。标准数据块大小通常是 8KB；
C.数据库创建完成后，标准块大小无法修改，这是数据库结构的一部分。
D.DBCA本身不负责配置备份策略。备份需要使用 RMAN（Recovery Manager）进行配置和管理
E.DBCA可以在创建新数据库时选择启用 Flashback Database，但不支持对已存在的数据库启用，这需要通过SQL命令或RMAN配置。

questions.QuestionText:
You plan to create a database by using the Database Configuration Assistant (DBCA), with the following specifications:
- Applications will connect to the database via a middle tier.
- The number of concurrent user connections will be high.
- The database will have mixed workload, with the execution of complex BI queries scheduled at night.
Which DBCA option must you choose to create the database?

Options.label: A
Options.text: A General Purpose database template with default memory allocation

Options.label: B
Options.text: A Data Warehouse database template, with the dedicated server mode option and AMM enabled

Options.label: C
Options.text: A General Purpose database template, with the shared server mode option and Automatic Memory Management (AMM) enabled

Options.label: D
Options.text: A default database configuration

questions.Explanation:
1.中间层连接:
应用程序不会直接连接数据库,而是通过中间层(Middle Tier)连接。中间层通常使用共享服务器(Shared Server)模式来处理大量并发连接
2.高并发用户连接:表明数据库可能有成百上千个连接
3.混合工作负载:白天有OLTP(Online Transaction Processing,联机事务处理操作:插入INSERT、更新UPDATE、删除DELETE、查询SELECT),晚上有复杂BI(Complex Business Intelligence复杂商业智能分析)查询(批量分析/报表).数据库需要灵活的内存管理来适应不同负载
A.General Purpose模板适合小到中型OLTP应用,默认内存分配通常比较保守。对于高并发和混合负载的情况可能性能不足
B.Data Warehouse模板适合大规模批量处理和分析(ETL/BI),优化为复杂查询性能。但题目中白天有大量中间层并发用户连接，使用 Dedicated Server 模式会消耗过多资源,不适合高并发OLTP场景。

questions.QuestionText: Which two options can be configured for an existing database by using the Database Configuration Assistant (DBCA)?

Options.label: A
Options.text: Database Resident Connection Pooling

Options.label: B
Options.text: Oracle Suggested Backup Strategy

Options.label: C
Options.text: Database Vault in ORACLE_HOME

Options.label: D
Options.text: Non default block size tablespaces

Options.label: E
Options.text: Configure Label Security

questions.Explanation:
A.DRCP是Oracle提供的轻量级连接池，用于中间层应用的高并发场景。配置DRCP不能通过DBCA，需要使用SQL/PLSQL或DBMS_CONNECTION_POOL包手动配置。
B.DBCA不配置备份策略。备份策略需要使用RMAN（Recovery Manager）或其他工具手动配置。
C.DBCA 可以为现有数据库启用或配置Database Vault（安全策略模块）,Database Vault提供访问控制、管理隔离和多重安全策略。配置路径通常位于 ORACLE_HOME 中。
D.数据库创建后，标准块大小无法修改.

questions.QuestionText:
You execute this query:
SELECT TO_CHAR(NEXT_DAY(LAST_DAY(SYSDATE), ‘MON’), ‘dd “Monday for” fmMonthrrrr’)
What is the result?

Options.label: A
Options.text: It executes successfully but does not return any result

Options.label: B
Options.text: It returns the date for the first Monday of the next month

Options.label: C
Options.text: It generates an error

Options.label: D
Options.text: It returns the date for the last Monday of the current month

questions.Explanation:
LAST_DAY(SYSDATE)返回当前月的最后一天。
‘dd “Monday for” fmMonthrrrr’ → dd是天，“Monday for”是string不变，fmMonth表示月名全称，fm去掉前导空格rrrr表示年份。例如:03 Monday for November2025

questions.QuestionText:
Examine this command:
CREATE UNDO TABLESPACE undotbs01
DATAFILE ‘undotbs_01.dbf’
SIZE 100M
AUTOEXTEND ON;
Which two actions must you take to ensure UNDOTBS01 is used as the default UNDO tablespace? (Choose two.)

Options.label: A
Options.text: Add the SEGMENT SPACE MANAGEMENT AUTO clause

Options.label: B
Options.text: Set UNDO_TABLESPACE to UNDOTBS01

Options.label: C
Options.text: Add the NOLOGGING clause

Options.label: D
Options.text: Make certain that the database operates in automatic undo management mode

Options.label: E
Options.text: Add the ONLINE clause

questions.Explanation:
UNDO 表空间用于存储回滚信息（undo data）Oracle 有两种 Undo 管理模式：1.手动 Undo 管理（Manual Undo Management）：通过回滚段（rollback segment）2.自动 Undo 管理（Automatic Undo Management, AUM）：通过UNDO表空间.要使用默认UNDO表空间，数据库必须处于AUM模式
A.SEGMENT SPACE MANAGEMENT AUTO 是为表空间的段空间管理,提供自动管理功能,对UNDO表空间不是必须的
C.NOLOGGING 用于减少日志生成，通常用于临时表或大批量导入,对 UNDO 表空间默认选择没有影响
E.ONLINE 表示表空间立即可用对默认 UNDO 表空间选择不是必须的

questions.QuestionText: Which three statements are true about views in an Oracle database? (Choose three.)

Options.label: A
Options.text: Views can be updated without the need to re-grant privileges on the view

Options.label: B
Options.text: Tables in the defining query of a view must always exist in order to create the view

Options.label: C
Options.text: The WITH CHECK clause prevents certain rows from being displayed when querying the view

Options.label: D
Options.text: Data Manipulation Language (DML) can always be used on views

Options.label: E
Options.text: Inserting one or more rows using a view whose defining query contains a GROUP BY clause will cause an error

Options.label: F
Options.text: Deleting one or more rows using a view whose defining query contains a GROUP BY clause will cause an error

Options.label: G
Options.text: The WITH CHECK clause prevents certain rows from being updated or inserted

questions.Explanation:
视图（View）虚拟表，不存储数据可基于一个或多个表或视图
可更新条件（可使用DML）：1.单表视图 2.不含 GROUP BY、DISTINCT、聚合函数 3.不含子查询或连接 
不可更新视图：聚合视图、复杂连接视图、含 DISTINCT 的视图
A.如果使用 CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW 修改视图，之前授予的权限会被删除。
B.如果使用 CREATE VIEW ... FORCE，即使表不存在也能创建视图,默认的 CREATE VIEW ... 需要表存在
C.WITH CHECK OPTION 并不限制查询结果的显示，它限制 通过视图插入或更新的数据，确保插入/更新的数据符合视图的条件
D.如果视图包含 GROUP BY、DISTINCT、JOIN、聚合函数等，一般不能直接执行 INSERT/UPDATE/DELETE

Options.label: A
Options.text: T1, an index segment for the primary key, a LOB segment, and a lobindex segment

Options.label: B
Options.text: No segments are created

Options.label: C
Options.text: T1 only

Options.label: D
Options.text: T1 and an index segment created for the primary key only

Options.label: E
Options.text: T1, an index segment for the primary key, and a LOB segment only

questions.Explanation: 因为段创建延迟设置为 true，建表时只要没有数据，段是不会创建的。

questions.QuestionText: Choose the best answer. Which statement is true about database links?

Options.label: A
Options.text: A public database link can be created only by SYS.

Options.label: B
Options.text: A database link created in a database allows a connection from that database's instance to the target database's instance, but not vice versa.

Options.label: C
Options.text: A public database link can be used by a user connected to the local database instance to connect to any schema in the remote database instance.

Options.label: D
Options.text: Private database link creation requires the same user to exist in both the local and the remote databases.

Options.label: E
Options.text: A database link can be created only between two Oracle databases.

questions.Explanation:
数据库链接DB Link用于在一个数据库实例中访问另一个远程数据库实例的数据
1.数据库链接类型:Private DB Link只对创建它的用户可见。Public DB Link对所有用户可见。
2.连接方向DB Link允许从本地数据库访问远程数据库,不自动允许远程数据库访问本地数据库
3.目标数据库访问权限:用户需要在远程数据库中有对应的账户或使用远程用户名和密码
A.公共数据库链接必须由拥有CREATE PUBLIC DATABASE LINK权限的用户创建
B.DB Link使用远程数据库的指定用户名,即使是 Public DB Link，也只能访问该远程用户名有权限访问的对象
D.私有DB Link不要求本地和远程用户同名。关键是:创建链接时指定远程用户名和密码即可
E.可以创建指向自已DBLINK连接

questions.QuestionText: Which three statements are true about views in an Oracle Database? (Choose three.)

Options.label: A
Options.text: Rows inserted into a table using a view are retained in the table if the view is dropped.

Options.label: B
Options.text: A view can be created that refers to a non-existent table in its defining query.

Options.label: C
Options.text: Views have no object number.

Options.label: D
Options.text: Views have no segment.

Options.label: E
Options.text: A SELECT statement cannot contain a WHERE clause when querying a view containing a WHERE clause in its defining query.

Options.label: F
Options.text: Views can join tables only if they belong to the same schema.

questions.Explanation:
A.视图 不存储数据，只是查询定义,通过视图插入的数据最终存储在 底层表 中,如果删除视图，数据仍然保存在表中
B.CREATE VIEW ... FORCE 可以创建指向不存在表的视图,CREATE VIEW ... 默认要求表必须存在,FORCE 允许先创建视图，稍后再创建表
C.视图也是数据库对象，在 USER_OBJECTS或ALL_OBJECTS中有OBJECT_ID,所以视图是有对象编号的
F.视图可以引用不同 schema 的表,使用 schema_name.table_name 即可

questions.QuestionText: Which two tasks can be performed in the NOMOUNT state?

Options.label: A
Options.text: Full database recovery

Options.label: B
Options.text: Re-creating control files

Options.label: C
Options.text: Renaming data files

Options.label: D
Options.text: Creating a database

Options.label: E
Options.text: Enabling online redo log archiving

questions.Explanation:
NOMOUNT 状态特点:SGA 已启动，后台进程已启动,控制文件未装入.适合：1.创建数据库 2.重新创建控制文件 3.修改初始化参数（如 DB_NAME）
MOUNT 状态特点:控制文件已装入,数据文件未打开. 适合：1.数据库恢复 2.数据文件（重命名，添加数据文件）或日志文件操作3.启用归档模式
OPEN 状态特点:数据库完全可用,可以执行普通查询、DML、DCL 等

questions.QuestionText: Which three statements are true about dynamic performance views?

Options.label: A
Options.text: They are owned by the SYSTEM user.

Options.label: B
Options.text: V$FIXED_TABLE can be queried to display the name of all dynamic performance views.

Options.label: C
Options.text: Data displayed by querying dynamic performance views is derived from metadata in the data dictionary.

Options.label: D
Options.text: Data displayed by querying dynamic performance views is derived from memory structures.

Options.label: E
Options.text: They can be queried only when the database is open.

Options.label: F
Options.text: Read consistency is not guaranteed.

questions.Explanation:
动态性能视图（通常以 V$ 开头）用于监控数据库实例的运行状态，提供关于 内存结构、锁、会话、缓冲区、性能统计 等信息。1.数据来源：SGA/PGA 内存结构，而非数据字典表2.用户权限：通常通过 PUBLIC权限访问3.使用场景：数据库性能诊断、调优
A.动态性能视图实际 物理拥有者是SYS用户,系统中对普通用户开放的是 PUBLIC synonym
B.V$FIXED_TABLE 是 V$视图的目录视图,可以列出所有动态性能视图及其对应的底层固定表（fixed tables）
E.V$视图中部分视图在 NOMOUNT 或 MOUNT 状态也可以访问,并非必须数据库 OPEN,例如 V$PARAMETER 可在 NOMOUNT 状态查询初始化参数
F.动态性能视图反映的是运行时内存状态,数据可能在查询过程中发生变化,因此不保证读一致性

questions.QuestionText: Which two are benefits of external tables?

Options.label: A
Options.text: The results of a complex join or aggregating function or both can be unloaded to a file for transportation to another database.

Options.label: B
Options.text: They can be queried while the database is in the MOUNT state like dynamic performance views.

Options.label: C
Options.text: They support DELETES which transparently deletes records in the file system as if they were table rows.

Options.label: D
Options.text: They support UPDATES which transparently updates records in the file system as if they were table rows.

Options.label: E
Options.text: They can be queried, transformed, and joined with other tables without having to load the data first.

questions.Explanation: E.外部表最大优势之一：无需先把文件数据加载到表中就能用 SQL 查询支持 JOIN、WHERE、GROUP BY、ORDER BY 等操作

questions.QuestionText:
DATADIR1 and DATADIR2 are database directory objects. Examine this command:
[oracle@host01 ~] expdp system/oracle \
> FULL=Y \
> DUMPFILE=datadir1:full%U.dmp, datadir2:full%U.dmp \
> FILESIZE=2G \
> PARALLEL=4 \
> LOGFILE=datadir1:/expfull.log \
> JOB_NAME=expfull
Which two statements are true about the expdp operation?

Options.label: A
Options.text: It starts only when four worker processes are available.

Options.label: B
Options.text: It fails if the total size of the dump file is more than 2GB.

Options.label: C
Options.text: It creates dump files only for objects in the SYSTEM schema.

Options.label: D
Options.text: It creates dump files for the entire database.

Options.label: E
Options.text: It creates a master table to store details of the export operation.

questions.Explanation:
使用 Data Pump Export（expdp） 工具导出数据库。
•用户是 system。
•FULL=Y → 导出整个数据库。
•DUMPFILE 指定多个目录和文件模板%U（自动编号：full01.dmp、full02.dmp…）。
•FILESIZE=2G → 每个转储文件最大 2GB，超过则生成新文件。
•PARALLEL=4 → 并行 4 个 worker 进程。
•LOGFILE 指定日志输出文件。
•JOB_NAME=expfull → 任务名称。A.Oracle Data Pump 会尽量分配并行度（PARALLEL）指定的 worker 数。但如果一开始没有足够 worker，任务也会启动，只是会动态分配或等待。并不是“等 4 个进程都空闲才开始”。
B.FILESIZE=2G 限制的是 每个文件的最大大小，不是整个导出总量。当文件到达 2GB 时，Data Pump 自动创建下一个文件（full02.dmp, full03.dmp, …）。
C.FULL=Y 表示导出整个数据库中 所有 schema
E.每个 Data Pump 任务都会在执行时，在导出用户的 schema 下创建一个 master table（主表）。用于记录导出的元信息（对象名、文件名、进度等）。作业完成后默认删除

questions.QuestionText: Which three actions are ways to apply the principle of least privilege?

Options.label: A
Options.text: Revoking execute privilege on UTL_SMTP, UTL_TCP, UTL_HTTP, and UTL_FILE from the PUBLIC user

Options.label: B
Options.text: Setting the REMOTE_OS_AUTHENT parameter to true

Options.label: C
Options.text: Using Access Control Lists (ACLs)

Options.label: D
Options.text: Enabling Unified Auditing

Options.label: E
Options.text: Revoking execute privilege on UTL_SMTP, UTL_TCP, UTL_HTTP, and UTL_FILE from the SYSTEM user

Options.label: F
Options.text: Setting the 07_DICTIONARY_ACCESSIBILITY parameter to true

questions.Explanation:
Principle of Least Privilege（最小权限原则） 是数据库安全的基本原则之一：每个用户、进程、应用程序都只能获得完成任务所需的最小权限，不多也不少。
A.这些包 (UTL_HTTP:HTTP请求,UTL_SMTP:发邮件,UTL_TCP:低层TCP通信,UTL_FILE:操作文件系统)能让 PL/SQL 程序访问外部资源,默认情况下，这些包可能对 PUBLIC（所有用户）可执行。这意味着任何用户都能发HTTP请求、访问文件、甚至外部系统 → 潜在安全风险。所以撤销对 PUBLIC 的 EXECUTE 权限，限制谁能访问这些网络或文件资源，就是典型的“最小权限”做法。
B.REMOTE_OS_AUTHENT 允许使用 远程操作系统认证。若为 TRUE，则 Oracle 信任来自远程系统的 OS 用户身份（即远程用户可不输入密码直接登录数据库）。这严重削弱安全性，相当于扩大权限而非最小化。
C.Access Control Lists (ACLs) 可细化控制哪些数据库用户/角色能：发 HTTP 请求;使用 UTL_SMTP、UTL_TCP、UTL_HTTP 等包;访问外部网络资源。通过 ACL，只允许特定用户访问特定主机/端口 → 精确授权 → 完全符合“最小权限原则”。
D.Unified Auditing 是 Oracle 的统一审计框架。它帮助 DBA 监控谁在用什么权限做什么操作。虽然“审计”本身不是减少权限，但它是实现最小权限原则的重要一环，因为：审计提供监督和可追踪性，帮助发现过度授权并进行调整。审计是最小权限控制的重要辅助手段。
E.SYSTEM 是 DBA 级别用户，管理数据库必然需要这些访问能力。撤销 SYSTEM 的权限反而会阻止必要的管理操作，不合逻辑。
F.如果设为 TRUE，则让非-SYS 用户可以直接访问数据字典（SYS schema 下的表视图）。这会 放宽访问控制，导致安全风险增加。

questions.QuestionText: Which two statements are true about the configuration and use of UNDO_RETENTION with no GUARANTEED RETENTION?

Options.label: A
Options.text: Unexpired UNDO is always retained.

Options.label: B
Options.text: UNDO_RETENTION specifies for how long Oracle attempts to keep expired and unexpired UNDO.

Options.label: C
Options.text: UNDO_RETENTION specifies how long all types of UNDO are retained.

Options.label: D
Options.text: Active UNDO is always retained.

Options.label: E
Options.text: UNDO_RETENTION specifies for how long Oracle attempts to keep unexpired UNDO.

questions.Explanation:
UNDO 表空间 保存事务的“旧值”（Undo 数据），主要作用是：回滚未提交事务；支持一致性读（consistent read）；支持闪回查询（flashback）.UNDO_RETENTION:保留undo数据的时间（以秒为单位）。
A.在 NOGUARANTEE模式下，不一定能保留。如果 undo 空间不够，Oracle 可能覆盖unexpired undo数据。
B.UNDO_RETENTION 只影响 unexpired undo 的最小保留时间。“expired” undo 已经过期，可以随时重用。
C.“all types of UNDO” 不准确。1.活跃（active）undo 永远保留直到事务结束。2.过期（expired）undo 可以随时重用。3.未过期（unexpired）undo 是 UNDO_RETENTION 控制的重点。

questions.QuestionText: Which two statements are true about a full outer join?

Options.label: A
Options.text: It returns only unmatched rows from both tables being joined.

Options.label: B
Options.text: It returns matched and unmatched rows from both tables being joined.

Options.label: C
Options.text: The Oracle join operator (+) must be used on both sides of the join condition in the WHERE clause.

Options.label: D
Options.text: It includes rows that are returned by an inner join.

Options.label: E
Options.text: It includes rows that are returned by a Cartesian product.

questions.Explanation:
FULL OUTER JOIN = LEFT OUTER JOIN + RIGHT OUTER JOIN,它返回两张表中 所有匹配行 + 所有不匹配行.
C.(+ ) 是 Oracle 的旧式语法（Oracle proprietary join syntax），只支持 左外连接 和 右外连接。Full outer join 不支持 (+ ) 语法，只能使用 ANSI 标准语法
D.因为 inner join 的结果（匹配行）包含在 full outer join 结果集中
E.笛卡尔积（Cartesian product） 是没有任何连接条件时的结果（A×B）。full outer join 仍然基于连接条件，只是补齐未匹配的行，不会产生全部组合。

questions.QuestionText:
Examine these SQL statements which execute successfully:
CREATE TABLE emp 
  (emp_no NUMBER(2) CONSTRAINT emp_emp_no_pk PRIMARY KEY, 
  ename VARCHAR2(15), 
  salary NUMBER(8,2), 
  mgr_no NUMBER(2));

ALTER TABLE emp ADD CONSTRAINT emp_mgr_fk 
  FOREIGN KEY (mgr_no) 
  REFERENCES emp (emp_no) 
  ON DELETE SET NULL;

ALTER TABLE emp 
  DISABLE CONSTRAINT emp_emp_no_pk 
  CASCADE;

ALTER TABLE emp 
  ENABLE CONSTRAINT emp_emp_no_pk;

Which two statements are true after execution?

Options.label: A
Options.text: The primary key constraint will be enabled and DEFERRED.

Options.label: B
Options.text: The primary key constraint will be enabled and IMMEDIATE.

Options.label: C
Options.text: The foreign key constraint will be enabled and IMMEDIATE.

Options.label: D
Options.text: The foreign key constraint will be disabled.

Options.label: E
Options.text: The foreign key constraint will be enabled and DEFERRED.

questions.Explanation:
主键约束和外键约束默认：1.ENABLED（启用）2.IMMEDIATE（立即检查约束）3.NOT DEFERRABLE（不可延迟）
DISABLE CASCADE禁用主键时，同时禁用引用该主键的外键约束
ENABLE 不传播 → 启用主键不会自动启用外键

questions.QuestionText: Which three statements are true about row chaining and row migration done by Oracle database block space management?

Options.label: A
Options.text: Update statements can result in one or more migrated rows.

Options.label: B
Options.text: Insert statements can result in a migrated row.

Options.label: C
Options.text: A migrated row results in an update to any index on the table to point the rowid in the index to the row's new location.

Options.label: D
Options.text: Row pieces of a chained row must always reside in different blocks.

Options.label: E
Options.text: Insert statements can result in a chained row.

Options.label: F
Options.text: Update statements can result in one or more chained rows.

questions.Explanation:
行迁移（Row Migration）发生条件：UPDATE 导致行在原来所在块无法完全存放,Oracle 会把整行搬到同一表的另一块,原来的数据块只保留一条指向新位置的指针（ROWID）
行链（Row Chaining）发生条件：INSERT 语句,插入的行太大，无法在一个数据块中存放,或者 分布式数据库 或 多块表空间设置 导致行跨块存储。原始行被拆成多段（row pieces）存放在不同块,ROWID 仍然能指向行的第一段,不仅 UPDATE，INSERT 也会产生行链

questions.QuestionText: Which two statements are true regarding Oracle database space management within blocks managed by Automatic Segment Space Management (ASSM)?

Options.label: A
Options.text: Update operations always relocate rows into blocks with free space appropriate to the length of the row being updated.

Options.label: B
Options.text: Insert operations always insert new rows into blocks with free space appropriate to the length of the row being inserted.

Options.label: C
Options.text: PCTFREE defaults to 10% for all blocks in all segments for all compression methods.

Options.label: D
Options.text: The first block with enough free space to accommodate a row being inserted will always be used for that row.

Options.label: E
Options.text: ASSM assigns blocks to one of four fullness categories based on what percentage of the block is allocated for rows.

questions.Explanation:
ASSM 的核心作用：自动跟踪哪些块有多少可用空间,自动决定新行要插入哪个块,提升并发性能(多个会话可同时插入),每当执行 INSERT 或 UPDATE，Oracle 都会：查找对应“空闲空间组”的位图（bitmap）；自动选择一个合适的块来放新行或更新后的行
A.UPDATE 并不会总是搬移行。如果当前块仍有足够空间 → 就地更新；如果空间不够 → 才会行迁移（row migration）
C.在未指定 PCTFREE 时，Oracle 默认值是 10%。表示每个块预留 10% 空间给 UPDATE 使用。无论是否压缩（compression），PCTFREE 默认都为 10%。可手动改为其他值（如 PCTFREE 20）。
E.四个“满度等级”fullness categories:full,75%full,50%full,empty/25%full

questions.QuestionText: Which two statements are true about the PMON background process?

Options.label: A
Options.text: It registers database services with all local and remote listeners known to the database instance.

Options.label: B
Options.text: It frees resources held by abnormally terminated processes.

Options.label: C
Options.text: It frees unused temporary segments.

Options.label: D
Options.text: It rolls back transactions when a process fails.

Options.label: E
Options.text: It records checkpoint information in the control file.

questions.Explanation:
PMON(Process Monitor)清理异常终止的用户进程，回滚未提交事务，释放锁和资源。清理失败进程的内存。会话异常终止时自动回滚。
SMON(System Monitor)实例恢复（crash recovery），合并空闲区（coalescing free space），清理临时段。
LREG(Listener Registration Process)向本地和远程监听器注册实例和服务信息。
CKPT(Checkpoint)更新控制文件和数据文件头中的 checkpoint 信息。不负责写数据块（写数据的是 DBWR）。负责同步 checkpoint 位置。

questions.QuestionText:
A script abc.sql must be executed to perform a certain task. User HR with password HR exists in the target database and the account is unlocked. The TNSNAMES.ORA file is up to date. Examine this command attempted by the user:

$ sqlplus hr/hr@orc1 @abc

What will happen and why?

Options.label: A
Options.text: The command succeeds and HR will be connected to the orcl database instance, and the abc script will be executed.

Options.label: B
Options.text: The command fails because the script must refer to the full path name.

Options.label: C
Options.text: The command succeeds and HR will be connected to the orcl database and after logging out to the abc database.

Options.label: D
Options.text: The command succeeds and HR will be connected to the orcl database instance, and the abc script will be executed.

Options.label: E
Options.text: The command fails and reports an error because @ is used twice.

questions.QuestionText: Which two are true about global temporary tables?

Options.label: A
Options.text: Backup and recovery operations are available for these tables.

Options.label: B
Options.text: Their data is always stored in the default temporary tablespace of the user who created them.

Options.label: C
Options.text: If the ON COMMIT clause is transaction specific, all rows in the table are deleted after each COMMIT or ROLLBACK.

Options.label: D
Options.text: Indexes can be created on them.

Options.label: E
Options.text: They can be created only by a user with the DBA role, but can be accessed by all users who can create a session.

Options.label: F
Options.text: If the ON COMMIT clause is session specific, the table is dropped when the session is terminated.

questions.Explanation:
全局临时表GTT:表结构是永久的，但数据是临时的。数据只对当前会话（session）可见，不同会话的数据相互隔离。适合存储临时计算结果、会话级数据等。
ON COMMIT DELETE ROWS（事务级Transaction-specific）每次 COMMIT 或 ROLLBACK 都会清空该会话中的表数据数据只在 事务内有效
ON COMMIT PRESERVE ROWS（会话级Session-specific）数据在 事务提交后仍然保留,直到会话结束才删除表数据
A.GTT 的数据是临时的，不参与常规备份和恢复。
B.数据确实存放在临时表空间（TEMP tablespace），但可以显式指定表空间，不一定是默认的。
E.普通用户只要有 CREATE TABLE 权限 就可以创建自己的 GTT

questions.QuestionText: Which three statements are true about GLOBAL TEMPORARY TABLES?

Options.label: A
Options.text: A GLOBAL TEMPORARY TABLE cannot have PUBLIC SYNONYM.

Options.label: B
Options.text: A GLOBAL TEMPORARY TABLE can have multiple indexes.

Options.label: C
Options.text: A GLOBAL TEMPORARY TABLE can be referenced in the defining query of a view.

Options.label: D
Options.text: Data Manipulation Language (DML) on GLOBAL TEMPORARY TABLES generates no REDO.

Options.label: E
Options.text: A GLOBAL TEMPORARY TABLE can have only one index.

Options.label: F
Options.text: A trigger can be created on a GLOBAL TEMPORARY TABLE.

questions.Explanation:
A.GTT 可以创建 PUBLIC SYNONYM，让其他用户通过同一个名字访问表结构（但访问的数据依然是各自会话的）。
B.全局临时表跟普通表一样，可以创建索引、视图、触发器等等，dml 操作同样也会产生 redo

questions.QuestionText: Which two statements are true about GLOBAL TEMPORARY TABLES?

Options.label: A
Options.text: GLOBAL TEMPORARY TABLE space allocation occurs at session start.

Options.label: B
Options.text: A GLOBAL TEMPORARY TABLE's definition is available to multiple sessions.

Options.label: C
Options.text: A DELETE command on a GLOBAL TEMPORARY TABLE cannot be rolled back.

Options.label: D
Options.text: A TRUNCATE command issued in a session causes all rows in a GLOBAL TEMPORARY TABLE for the issuing session to be deleted.

Options.label: E
Options.text: GLOBAL TEMPORARY TABLE rows inserted by a session are available to any other session whose user has been granted SELECT on the table.

questions.Explanation: A.普通表进行第一次DML 操作时，会为表段分配空间;临时表则在创建临时表空间分配

Options.label: A
Options.text: To drop the table in this session, you must first truncate it.

Options.label: B
Options.text: When you terminate your session, the row will be deleted.

Options.label: C
Options.text: Other sessions can view the committed row.

Options.label: D
Options.text: You can add a foreign key to the table.

Options.label: E
Options.text: You can add a column to the table in this session.

questions.Explanation:
A.会话级 GTT 的表存在会话级数据。为了 DROP TABLE，必须先删除该会话的数据（通常通过 TRUNCATE）。
D.外键是跨表约束，需要保证数据一致性,GTT 数据是临时的，跨会话不可见，无法保证约束的完整性.GTT 表结构修改前，确保表中无数据；索引可以，但外键不允许；事务级数据提交后消失，会话级数据存在期间不能修改表。
E.表结构修改（ALTER TABLE ADD COLUMN） 对 GTT 是 永久的，作用于表定义对当前会话生效与否不相关，题目选项的表述不正确ALTER TABLE 可以增加列，但不是“只在本会话生效

questions.QuestionText: Which three statements are true about GLOBAL TEMPORARY TABLES?

Options.label: A
Options.text: A DELETE command on GLOBAL TEMPORARY TABLE cannot be rolled back.

Options.label: B
Options.text: GLOBAL TEMPORARY TABLE rows inserted by a session are available to any other session whose user has been granted SELECT on the table.

Options.label: C
Options.text: Any GLOBAL TEMPORARY TABLE rows existing at session termination will be deleted.

Options.label: D
Options.text: A GLOBAL TEMPORARY TABLE's definition is available to multiple sessions.

Options.label: E
Options.text: GLOBAL TEMPORARY TABLE space allocation occurs at session start.

Options.label: F
Options.text: A TRUNCATE command issued in a session causes all rows in a GLOBAL TEMPORARY TABLE for the issuing session to be deleted.

questions.Explanation: GTT 默认是事务级（transaction-specific）只有显式指定 ON COMMIT PRESERVE ROWS 才是会话级（session-specific）

questions.QuestionText: Which two statements are true about Enterprise Manager Database Express?

Options.label: A
Options.text: The same port number can be used for Database Express configurations for databases on different hosts.

Options.label: B
Options.text: It can be used to switch a database into ARCHIVELOG MODE.

Options.label: C
Options.text: It can be used to perform database recovery when the database is mounted.

Options.label: D
Options.text: The same port number can be used for multiple Database Express configurations for multiple databases on the same host.

Options.label: E
Options.text: It can be used to perform database recovery when the database is opened.

Options.label: F
Options.text: It is available only when the database is open.

questions.Explanation:
Enterprise Manager Database Express（简称 EM Express）:轻量级 Web 管理工具,内嵌在数据库中，无需额外安装,用于单实例数据库的管理和监控
主要功能：启动/关闭数据库,性能监控,用户管理,配置数据库参数
访问方式：浏览器通过 HTTPS（默认端口 5500）访问
EMDE 就是一个阉割版的 oem(Oracle Enterprise Manager)，很多功能都没有，但是使用起来很方便，只能做为简单的监视作用。
B.EM Express 无法进行数据库模式切换（ARCHIVELOG / NOARCHIVELOG）这些操作需要 SQL*Plus 或 RMAN 执行
C.EM Express 不能进行恢复操作

questions.QuestionText: Which two statements are true about the Oracle Data Dictionary?

Options.label: A
Options.text: All data dictionary view join base tables to dynamic performance views.

Options.label: B
Options.text: Data dictionary base tables can be queried directly.

Options.label: C
Options.text: It is owned by the SYS user.

Options.label: D
Options.text: It is owned by the SYSTEM user.

Options.label: E
Options.text: Data dictionary views are always created with queries that join two or more base tables.

questions.Explanation:
数据字典（Data Dictionary）：是 Oracle 数据库内部管理数据库对象的元数据集合,包含数据库结构信息，如表、索引、用户、视图、约束等,存储在SYS schema下的表中,通过数据字典视图（Data Dictionary Views） 访问，不直接操作底层数据字典表.数据字典基表可以直接查询，并且属于基表，只能够在数据库 open 的时候看到
A.动态性能视图是虚拟表,存在于SGA中,数据字典视图是基于基表,以ALL_,USER_,DBA_开头
E.数据字典视图只查询 一张 SYS 表，不一定要join多张表

questions.QuestionText:
You execute this command:

CREATE SMALLFILE TABLESPACE sales
DATAFILE '/u01/app/oracle/sales01.dbf'
SIZE 5G
SEGMENT SPACE MANAGEMENT AUTO;

Which two statements are true about the SALES tablespace?

Options.label: A
Options.text: It is a locally managed tablespace.

Options.label: B
Options.text: It must be smaller than the smallest BIGFILE tablespace.

Options.label: C
Options.text: Free space is managed using freelists.

Options.label: D
Options.text: It uses the database default blocksize.

Options.label: E
Options.text: Any data files added to the tablespace must have a size of 5 gigabytes.

questions.Explanation:
A.默认创建 SMALLFILE 表空间时为 LMT（Locally Managed Tablespace使用位图（bitmap）管理空闲区，效率高，支持自动扩展和大表空间）
E.SIZE 5G 只是 初始数据文件大小以后添加数据文件可以指定任意大小，或者使用 AUTOEXTEND ON 自动增长

Options.label: A
Options.text: Online redo logs are opened.

Options.label: B
Options.text: Oracle background processes are started.

Options.label: C
Options.text: The initialization parameter file is read.

Options.label: D
Options.text: Control files are read.

Options.label: E
Options.text: Online data files are opened.

Options.label: F
Options.text: Oracle shared memory structures are allocated.

Options.label: G
Options.text: The alert log has instance startup details written to it.

questions.Explanation: MOUNT 阶段主要做两件事：1.读取控制文件2.记录 alert log 中实例启动信息

questions.QuestionText: Which two statements are true about advanced connection options supported by Oracle Net for connection to Oracle Database instances?

Options.label: A
Options.text: Source Routing requires the use of encrypted connections.

Options.label: B
Options.text: Connect Time Failover requires the use of Transparent Application Failover (TAF).

Options.label: C
Options.text: Connect Time Failover requires the connect string to have two or more listener addresses configured.

Options.label: D
Options.text: Load Balancing requires the use of a name server.

Options.label: E
Options.text: Load Balancing can balance the number of connections to dispatchers when using a Shared Server configuration.

questions.Explanation:
A.源路由：你自己画好路线图 → Source Routing,与加密无关，不要求加密连接.普通路由：出门随便走，网络自动选最优路线 → TCP/IP 默认路由.
B.Connect Time Failover (CTF)在客户端连接数据库时，如果第一个监听器不可用，可以尝试第二个监听器，实现连接的高可用性,只在建立连接时生效,不依赖 TAF（Transparent Application Failover）,需要在connect string 中配置多个 listener地址.Transparent Application Failover (TAF)主要用于已经建立的会话,如果会话所在实例失败，TAF 可以尝试在另一个实例上重建会话与Connect Time Failover不同，CTF 是在连接阶段生效，TAF是在会话运行阶段生效
D.Load Balancing (负载均衡)在使用 RAC 或共享服务器（Shared Server）时，将客户端连接请求分配到多个实例或多个 dispatcher,可以在 Shared Server 模式下对 dispatcher 连接数进行均衡,不依赖 name server(DNS 也可用),与 TAF 无关

questions.QuestionText: Which two statements are true about external tables in Oracle 18c and later releases?

Options.label: A
Options.text: The ORACLE_LOADER access driver can be used to unload data from a database into an external table.

Options.label: B
Options.text: External table files can be used for other external tables in a different database.

Options.label: C
Options.text: They cannot be partitioned.

Options.label: D
Options.text: The ORACLE_DATAPUMP access driver can be used to unload data from a database into an external table.

Options.label: E
Options.text: They support UPDATEs but not INSERTs and DELETEs.

questions.Explanation:
A.ORACLE_LOADER从文本文件（CSV、固定宽度等）读取数据到外部表,只能读取.ORACLE_DATAPUMP使用 Data Pump dump 文件进行数据导入/导出,可以读写，即可以用来unload数据到外部表或load数据到数据库
C.Oracle 18c及以后，外部表支持分区。
E.外部表通常 不支持 DML，即 INSERT/UPDATE/DELETE 都不行

questions.QuestionText: Which two statements are true about single-row functions?

Options.label: A
Options.text: They return a single result row per table.

Options.label: B
Options.text: They can be used only in the WHERE clause of a SELECT statement.

Options.label: C
Options.text: They can accept only one argument.

Options.label: D
Options.text: The argument can be a column name, variable, literal, or an expression.

Options.label: E
Options.text: The data type returned can be different from the data type of the argument.

questions.Explanation:
A.单行函数 每行返回一个值,如果表有 10 行，函数执行 10 次，返回 10 个结果,聚合函数（SUM, AVG）才是 每表一行
B.单行函数可以用在 SELECT、WHERE、ORDER BY、GROUP BY 等子句
C.单行函数可以接受多个参数,如decode,nvl2等函数
D.单行函数参数可以是：列名：UPPER(ename)变量：ROUND(:sal,2)字面值：TO_DATE('2025-10-25','YYYY-MM-DD')表达式：ROUND(salary*1.1,0)
E.如to_char()

questions.QuestionText: Which three statements are true regarding single row subqueries?

Options.label: A
Options.text: They can be used in the WHERE clause.

Options.label: B
Options.text: They must be placed on the right side of the comparison operator or condition.

Options.label: C
Options.text: They must return a row to prevent errors in the SQL statement.

Options.label: D
Options.text: They must be placed on the left side of the comparison operator or condition.

Options.label: E
Options.text: A SQL statement may have multiple single row subquery blocks.

Options.label: F
Options.text: They can be used in the HAVING clause.

questions.Explanation:
B.单行子查询通常放在 比较符号右边，但也可以用在 FROM 列表、SELECT 列表，或与 IN、EXISTS 等组合
B.单行子查询可以返回 NULL（零行）返回零行不会报错，但如果使用 = 比较符号，结果可能是空集,单行子查询只允许返回一行，返回多行才会报错

questions.QuestionText: Which three statements are true about single-row functions?

Options.label: A
Options.text: They can accept only one argument.

Options.label: B
Options.text: They can be nested to any level.

Options.label: C
Options.text: They return a single result row per table.

Options.label: D
Options.text: The data type returned can be different from the data type of the argument.

Options.label: E
Options.text: The argument can be a column name, variable, literal, or an expression.

Options.label: F
Options.text: They can be used only in the WHERE clause of a SELECT statement.

questions.QuestionText: Which two statements are true about the Automatic Diagnostic Repository (ADR)?

Options.label: A
Options.text: It supports diagnostics for Automatic Storage Management (ASM).

Options.label: B
Options.text: It supports diagnostics for Oracle Clusterware.

Options.label: C
Options.text: It is held inside an Oracle database schema.

Options.label: D
Options.text: It supports diagnostics for Oracle based applications.

Options.label: E
Options.text: It is held in an Oracle database data dictionary.

questions.Explanation:
ADR（Automatic Diagnostic Repository）集中存储 Oracle 数据库和相关组件的诊断信息.
存储内容：
1.日志文件（alert log、trace files）
2.Dump 文件
3.栈跟踪信息（stack traces）
4.健康报告（Health Monitor）
5.incident 信息
特点：
1.独立于数据库schema
2.目录结构在文件系统上，而不是存储在数据库内部
3.可通过工具访问：ADRCI、Enterprise Manager
ADR支持的组件:
1.数据库实例
2.SM（Automatic Storage Management）ASM的trace文件、alert log 都存储在ADR中
3.Oracle Clusterware:集群的 CRS（Cluster Ready Services）日志也可以存放在 ADR.
D.ADR 主要用于数据库和集群组件的诊断，不直接存储应用日志，数据库/集群日志关注系统健康，应用日志关注业务操作
E.数据字典只存数据库对象元数据，ADR是文件系统目录

questions.QuestionText: Which two statements are true about the Automatic Diagnostic Repository (ADR)?

Options.label: A
Options.text: The ADR base is shared across multiple instances.

Options.label: B
Options.text: The ADR base keeps all diagnostic information in binary format.

Options.label: C
Options.text: The ADR can be used to store statspack snapshots to diagnose database performance issues.

Options.label: D
Options.text: The ADR can be used for problem diagnosis even when the database instance is down.

Options.label: E
Options.text: The ADR is used to store Automatic Workload Repository (AWR) snapshots.

questions.Explanation:
A.ADR base是一个主目录，可以被同一主机上的多个数据库实例共享,每个实例有自己的 ADR home，但都存放在同一个ADR base下
B.ADR 中大部分信息是 文本格式（alert log、trace）也有部分 dump 或 incident 文件是二进制，但不是全部
C.Statspack 是传统性能诊断工具,Statspack snapshot 存在 数据库表空间，不是 ADR 文件系统
D.ADR 是文件系统目录，诊断文件可在数据库关闭时访问,使用工具：adrci
E.AWR snapshots存储在数据库表空间中的SYSAUX(SYSTEM辅助表空间（Auxiliary Tablespace）) ，不在ADR,ADR 可辅助分析AWR相关问题，但不存AWR数据

questions.QuestionText: Which are two of the account management capabilities that can be configured using Oracle profiles?

Options.label: A
Options.text: The maximum amount of CPU time allowed for a user's sessions before their account is locked.

Options.label: B
Options.text: The number of days for which an account may be inactive before it is locked.

Options.label: C
Options.text: The maximum number of sessions permitted for a user before the password must be changed.

Options.label: D
Options.text: The ability to prevent a password from ever being reused.

Options.label: E
Options.text: The number of days for which an account may be logged in to one or more sessions before it is locked.

questions.Explanation:
账户管理能力Account Management:
1. 密码管理Password Management
--PASSWORD_LIFE_TIME:密码有效期(多少天后必须更改密码)
--PASSWORD_REUSE_MAX:防止密码重复使用
--PASSWORD_VERIFY_FUNCTION:密码复杂度
--FAILED_LOGIN_ATTEMPTS:失败登录尝试次数
2.账户锁定/失效策略Account Lock / Expiry
--PASSWORD_GRACE_TIME:密码过期前的宽限期
--INACTIVE_ACCOUNT_TIME:账户在多少天不被使用后被锁定

Profile 参与 Resource Limit:它定义了限制规则实际执行 Resource Limit:由数据库内核Kernel在运行时强制

questions.QuestionText: Which two statements are true about SQL*Loader Express Mode in an Oracle 12c database?

Options.label: A
Options.text: It can load data in parallel.

Options.label: B
Options.text: No data file needs to be specified.

Options.label: C
Options.text: It loads data faster than conventional SQL*Loader.

Options.label: D
Options.text: It loads data more efficiently than conventional SQL*Loader.

Options.label: E
Options.text: It requires Enterprise Manager Express to be configured.

questions.Explanation:
Oracle SQL*Loader 有两种主要加载模式:
1.Conventional Path（传统路径）:将数据逐行解析并插入表。适合小量或复杂的数据转换。
2.Express Mode（快速加载/Express 模式）主要特点是无需提供控制文件，自动识别数据文件和目标表。使用方式更简单，适合快速、轻量级的数据加载任务。

CD.不一定总是比传统 SQL*Loader 快。Express Mode 的设计目标是简化操作，而不是绝对性能优化。对于大规模数据，传统路径（conventional path）或者直接路径（direct path）可能更快
F.Express Mode 完全独立于 Enterprise Manager Express,可以在命令行直接使用 sqlldr 命令启动 Express Mode

questions.QuestionText:
On your Oracle 19c database, you invoke SQL*Loader to load data into the employees table in the HR schema by issuing the command:

$> sqlldr hr/hr@pdb table=employees

Which two statements are true about the command?

Options.label: A
Options.text: It succeeds with default settings if the employees table exists in the HR schema.

Options.label: B
Options.text: It fails because no SQL*Loader data file location is specified.

Options.label: C
Options.text: It fails if the HR user does not have the CREATE ANY DIRECTORY privilege.

Options.label: D
Options.text: It fails because no SQL*Loader control file location is specified.

Options.label: E
Options.text: It succeeds and creates the employees table in the HR schema.

questions.Explanation:
SQL*Loader 有 Express Mode。在 Express Mode 下：只需指定表名 (table=employees)。
默认情况下:
--数据文件会默认在当前目录下，文件名为 <table>.csv 或 <table>.dat
--控制文件不需要显式提供，系统会自动生成控制逻辑。
所以命令可以工作 前提条件是:
--1.表 employees已存在
--2.用户有访问数据文件的权限。
--3.对外部目录的访问权限符合要求。

C.SQL*Loader 在后台需要创建临时目录对象来读取数据文件。如果用户没有 CREATE ANY DIRECTORY 权限，Express Mode 会报错

questions.QuestionText:
In an Oracle 12c database, you attempt to load data into the HR.EMPLOYEES table in a pluggable database (PDB):

$> sqlldr hr/hr@pdb table=employees

Which three are true?

Options.label: A
Options.text: It creates the HR.EMPLOYEES table in the PDB and loads data into it if the table does not exist in the PDB to which HR connects.

Options.label: B
Options.text: It loads data into HR.EMPLOYEES if the table exists in CDB$ROOT.

Options.label: C
Options.text: It succeeds if HR is a local user in the PDB to which HR connects.

Options.label: D
Options.text: It succeeds if HR is a common user.

Options.label: E
Options.text: It loads data into HR.EMPLOYEES if the table exists in the PDB to which HR connects.

questions.Explanation:
在 Oracle 12c 的多租户架构中:
--1.Common User（通用用户）:在 CDB$ROOT 创建，可以访问所有 PDB。用户名前通常有 C## 前缀（如果使用默认设置）。
--2.Local User（本地用户）:只存在于某个 PDB 内。只能访问创建所在 PDB 的对象
一个容器数据库（CDB, Container Database） 可以包含 多个可插拔数据库（PDB, Pluggable Database）.CDB$ROOT = 容器数据库的核心“根”，主要存储系统和管理信息。PDB = 独立的可插拔数据库，用于存放具体业务数据。数据加载工具（如 SQL*Loader）只作用于你连接的 PDB，而不是 CDB$ROOT，除非你用 common user 并在 CDB$ROOT 执行管理操作

questions.QuestionText: Which two statements are true about table data storage in an Oracle Database?

Options.label: A
Options.text: Data block free space is always contiguous in the middle of the block.

Options.label: B
Options.text: A table row can be chained across several database blocks.

Options.label: C
Options.text: Multiple row pieces from the same row may be stored in same database blocks.

Options.label: D
Options.text: Index block free space is always contiguous in the middle of the block.

Options.label: E
Options.text: Multiple row pieces from the same row must be stored in different database blocks.

questions.QuestionText: Which two statements are true about views?

Options.label: A
Options.text: Views can be updated without the need to re-grant privileges on the view.

Options.label: B
Options.text: Views can be indexed.

Options.label: C
Options.text: A view must only refer to tables in its defining query.

Options.label: D
Options.text: The WITH CHECK clause prevents certain rows from being displayed when querying the view.

Options.label: E
Options.text: The WITH CHECK clause prevents certain rows from being updated or inserted in the underlying table through the view.

questions.Explanation: B.普通视图（普通 SELECT）不能直接建立索引。只有物化视图（Materialized View） 才能建立索引，以提高查询性能

questions.QuestionText: Which two statements are true about views?

Options.label: A
Options.text: Views can be updated without the need to re-grant privileges on the view.

Options.label: B
Options.text: Views can be indexed.

Options.label: C
Options.text: The WITH CHECK clause prevents certain rows from being updated or inserted in the underlying table through the view.

Options.label: D
Options.text: The WITH CHECK clause prevents certain rows from being displayed when querying the view.

Options.label: E
Options.text: Tables in the defining query of a view must always exist in order to create the view.

questions.QuestionText: Which two statements are true about undo segments and the use of undo by transactions in an Oracle database instance?

Options.label: A
Options.text: A single transaction may use multiple undo segments simultaneously.

Options.label: B
Options.text: Undo segments can wrap around to the first extent when a transaction fills the last extent of the undo segment.

Options.label: C
Options.text: Undo segments can extend when a transaction fills the last extent of the undo segment.

Options.label: D
Options.text: Undo segments can be stored in the SYSTEM tablespace.

Options.label: E
Options.text: Undo segments can be stored in the SYSAUX tablespace.

questions.Explanation:
Undo Segment（撤销段） 是 Oracle 用来：实现 事务回滚（ROLLBACK）；支持 读一致性（Read Consistency）；支持 闪回查询（Flashback Query）。每个事务在开始时，会被分配一个 undo segment，用于存储该事务的撤销信息（undo records）。

BC.如果能循环利用 → wrap around；如果不能 → 自动扩展新的 extent。
DE.撤销段应存放在 独立的 UNDO 表空间

questions.QuestionText: Which two statements are true about date/time functions in a session where NLS_DATE_FORMAT is set to DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS?

Options.label: A
Options.text: SYSDATE can be queried only from the DUAL table.

Options.label: B
Options.text: SYSDATE and CURRENT_DATE return the current date and time set for the operating system of the client.

Options.label: C
Options.text: CURRENT_TIMESTAMP returns the same date and time as SYSDATE with additional details of fractional seconds.

Options.label: D
Options.text: CURRENT_DATE returns the current date and time as per the session time zone.

Options.label: E
Options.text: SYSDATE can be used in expressions only if the default date format is DD-MON-RR.

Options.label: F
Options.text: CURRENT_TIMESTAMP returns the same date as CURRENT_DATE.

questions.Explanation: A.SYSDATE 可以在任何 SQL 表达式或查询中使用，不限于 DUAL

questions.QuestionText: Which two statements are true about the tools used to configure Oracle Net Services?

Options.label: A
Options.text: The lsnrctl utility requires a listener.ora file to exist before it is started.

Options.label: B
Options.text: Enterprise Manager Cloud Control can be used to centrally configure net service names for any database server target.

Options.label: C
Options.text: The Oracle Net Configuration Assistant is only used when running the Oracle installer.

Options.label: D
Options.text: Oracle Net Manager can be used to locally configure naming methods on a database server.

Options.label: E
Options.text: Oracle Net Manager can be used to centrally configure listeners on any database server target.

questions.Explanation:
Oracle Net Services 负责客户端与数据库服务器之间的网络通信，主要配置内容包括:
--Listener（监听器）：监听客户端连接请求
--TNS名称解析（Naming methods）
--Service Name / SID 映射
Oracle 提供了几种配置工具：
--Oracle Net Manager (netmgr):图形化配置监听器、命名方法、服务名称等(本地);本地配置服务器网络参数
--Oracle Net Configuration Assistant (netca):向导式配置（安装时或独立运行）;安装数据库时或后续手动配置
--lsnrctl命令行控制监听器（启动/停止/状态）;管理监听器
--Enterprise Manager (EM Cloud Control)集中式图形化管理多个数据库的网络配置;企业集中管理

A.lsnrctl 可以在没有 listener.ora 文件时启动默认监听器，默认名称是LISTENER，默认端口1521。→ 如果 listener.ora 不存在，它会使用默认配置启动监听器。

questions.QuestionText:
You currently have an active transaction in your session and have been granted SELECT access to V$TRANSACTION.
Executing: 

SELECT xid, status FROM v$transaction; 

in your session returns: 

XID                   STATUS 
--------------------------- --------------
 0A0007000A070000        ACTIVE 

In which three situations will re-executing this query still return a row but with a different XID, indicating a new transaction has started?

Options.label: A
Options.text: after successfully executing a CREATE TABLE AS SELECT statement followed by a SELECT FOR UPDATE statement

Options.label: B
Options.text: after successfully executing a COMMIT or ROLLBACK followed by a DML statement

Options.label: C
Options.text: after successfully executing a TRUNCATE statement followed by a DML statement

Options.label: D
Options.text: after successfully executing a DML statement following a failed DML statement

Options.label: E
Options.text: after successfully executing a COMMIT or ROLLBACK followed by a SELECT statement

Options.label: F
Options.text: after successfully executing a CREATE TABLE statement followed by a CREATE INDEX statement

questions.Explanation:
XID (Transaction ID) 全称是 Transaction Identifier（事务标识符），是 Oracle 数据库为每个活动事务（active transaction）分配的一个唯一编号，新事务的开始 才会导致XID变化
事务开始与结束:
--DML（INSERT/UPDATE/DELETE/MERGE）启动事务;不结束
--COMMIT / ROLLBACK结束事务
--SELECT不启动、不结束
--CREATE TABLE / CREATE INDEX（DDL）自动启动事务;自动提交（结束）
--TRUNCATE自动启动事务;自动提交（结束）

A.CREATE TABLE AS SELECT是一个 DDL，会启动一个事务并自动提交;结束后事务已结束（没有活动事务）。SELECT FOR UPDATE是一个特殊的 SELECT，会锁定行，启动一个新的事务。

questions.QuestionText: What is true about non-equijoin statement performance?

Options.label: A
Options.text: The BETWEEN condition used with a non-equijoin always performs better than when using the >= and <= conditions.

Options.label: B
Options.text: The join syntax used makes no difference to performance.

Options.label: C
Options.text: The BETWEEN condition used with a non-equijoin sometimes performs better than using the >= and <= conditions.

Options.label: D
Options.text: The Oracle join syntax performs less well than the SQL:1999 compliant ANSI join syntax.

Options.label: E
Options.text: The Oracle join syntax performs better than the SQL:1999 compliant ANSI join syntax.

questions.QuestionText:
You want to apply the principle of Least Privilege in all your live databases. One of your requirements is to revoke unnecessary privileges from all users who have them using Privilege Analysis.
 Which two are types of analyses that can be done using the DBMS_PRIVILEGE_CAPTURE package?

Options.label: A
Options.text: analysis of privileges granted indirectly to a role that are then used by a user who has been granted that role

Options.label: B
Options.text: analysis of privileges that a user has on other schema's objects

Options.label: C
Options.text: analysis of privileges that a user has on their own schema objects

Options.label: D
Options.text: analysis of privileges granted directly to a role that are then used by a user who has been granted that role

Options.label: E
Options.text: analysis of all privileges used by the SYS user.

questions.Explanation:
DBMS_PRIVILEGE_CAPTURE 是Oracle提供的一个包，用于：收集用户和角色使用的权限情况;分析哪些权限被真正使用，哪些权限没用;帮助安全团队撤销冗余权限，实现最小权限原则
B.Privilege Capture主要分析用户使用的权限，不局限schema
C.用户对自己 schema 的权限一般不需要分析（因为默认拥有）
E.SYS 是超级用户，权限永远被使用，不适合分析最小权限，也不在 Privilege Capture 的范围

questions.QuestionText: Which two statements are true regarding indexes?

Options.label: A
Options.text: The RECYCLE BIN never contains indexes.

Options.label: B
Options.text: An update to a table can result in updates to any or all of the table's indexes.

Options.label: C
Options.text: A non-unique index can be altered to be unique.

Options.label: D
Options.text: An update to a table can result in no updates to any of the table's indexes.

Options.label: E
Options.text: A table belonging to one user cannot have an index that belongs to a different user.

questions.Explanation:
C.要从非唯一变为唯一，必须：删除非唯一索引;创建一个新的唯一索引.不能直接 ALTER INDEX 改变唯一性。
E.索引必须属于与表相同的用户

questions.QuestionText: Which two statements are true concerning logical and physical database structures?

Options.label: A
Options.text: A segment might have only one extent.

Options.label: B
Options.text: A segment's blocks can be of different sizes.

Options.label: C
Options.text: Segments can span multiple tablespaces.

Options.label: D
Options.text: All tablespaces may have one or more data files.

Options.label: E
Options.text: A segment can span multiple data files in some tablespaces.

questions.QuestionText: Which two statements are true about the Oracle join and ANSI join syntax?

Options.label: A
Options.text: The Oracle join syntax performs less well than the SQL:1999 compliant ANSI join syntax.

Options.label: B
Options.text: The Oracle join syntax supports creation of a Cartesian product of two tables.

Options.label: C
Options.text: The Oracle join syntax lacks the ability to do outer joins.

Options.label: D
Options.text: The SQL:1999 compliant ANSI join syntax supports creation of a Cartesian product of two tables.

Options.label: E
Options.text: The Oracle join syntax performs better than the SQL:1999 compliant ANSI join syntax.

questions.Explanation: A.Oracle join 语法支持 外连接，通过 (+) 实现

questions.QuestionText: Which three relationships between instances and Oracle databases are possible without using Multi-tenant?

Options.label: A
Options.text: One instance on one server that has no database mounted.

Options.label: B
Options.text: One instance on one server mounting and opening one database.

Options.label: C
Options.text: One instance on one server mounting and opening multiple databases.

Options.label: D
Options.text: Two or more instances on separate servers all mounting and opening the same database.

Options.label: E
Options.text: One instance on one server mounting multiple databases.

questions.QuestionText: Which two statements are true?

Options.label: A
Options.text: SALES1 is created with 55,000 rows.

Options.label: B
Options.text: SALES1 is created with no rows.

Options.label: C
Options.text: SALES1 has NOT NULL constraints on any selected columns which had those constraints in the SALES table.

Options.label: D
Options.text: SALES1 has PRIMARY KEY and UNIQUE constraints on any selected columns which had those constraints in the SALES table.

Options.label: E
Options.text: SALES1 is created with 1 row.

questions.Explanation:
A.WHERE 1 = 1对所有行都成立，所以SELECT会选中SALES的所有55,000行
C.CTAS会继承 NOT NULL 约束。但是CTAS不会继承PRIMARY KEY、UNIQUE、FOREIGN KEY等约束，也不会继承索引

Options.label: A
Options.text: You can add a WHERE clause with filtering criteria.

Options.label: B
Options.text: It returns the same rows as SELECT * FROM bricks CROSS JOIN colors;.

Options.label: C
Options.text: You can add a USING clause with a join condition.

Options.label: D
Options.text: It returns the number of rows in BRICKS plus the number of rows in COLORS.

Options.label: E
Options.text: You can add an ON clause with a join condition.

questions.Explanation:
Oracle的旧式逗号连接语法（comma join）如果没有 WHERE 条件，它会生成 笛卡尔积（Cartesian product）笛卡尔积的结果行数 = bricks 表的行数 × colors 表的行数
A.旧式逗号连接允许在WHERE子句中添加条件,进行过滤或模拟连接,相当于INNER JOIN
C.USING是ANSI join（JOIN … ON / JOIN … USING）语法 的一部分,逗号旧式连接不能直接用USING
E.ON 也是 ANSI join（JOIN … ON） 的语法,旧式逗号连接只能用 WHERE

questions.QuestionText: Which two are true about unused columns?

Options.label: A
Options.text: You can query the data dictionary to see the names of unused columns.

Options.label: B
Options.text: CASCADE CONSTRAINTS must be specified when setting a column to unused if that column is referenced in a constraint on another column.

Options.label: C
Options.text: Setting an indexed column to unused results in an error.

Options.label: D
Options.text: If you set all the columns of a table to unused, the table is automatically dropped.

Options.label: E
Options.text: You can specify multiple column names in an ALTER TABLE... SET UNUSED statement.

questions.Explanation:
A.只能看见计数
B.如果列被约束（例如 FOREIGN KEY 或 CHECK 约束）引用，必须使用 CASCADE CONSTRAINTS,这样会自动删除引用该列的约束，否则会报错
D.设置所有列为 UNUSED 只是标记列未使用，表仍然存在;需要显式执行 DROP TABLE 或 DROP UNUSED COLUMNS 来物理删除
